scripts: create service user sitemapServiceUser1 with path system/cq:services/wknd

set ACL for sitemapServiceUser1
 allow jcr:read,jcr:write on /content/wknd
 allow jcr:read,jcr:write,jcr:versionManagement,jcr:modifyAccessControl,jcr:modifyProperties,jcr:addChildNodes,jcr:nodeTypeManagement,jcr:readAccessControl on /content/dam
 allow jcr:read,jcr:write on /var
 allow jcr:read,jcr:write on /content
end
